text: The 2018/19 FIS Nordic Combined World Cup was the 36th World Cup season, organized by the International Ski Federation. It started on 24 November 2018 in Ruka, Finland and concluded on 17 March 2019 in Schonach, Germany. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff;
